RSVP.title: Rsvp
RSVP.description: Search by your full name as it appears on your invitation to find your group. You can change your response at any time, just please remember to respond by 4/20/25!

SCHEDULE.title: Schedule
SCHEDULE.description: We will have a mix of activities planned before and after wedding day. Please feel free to join for as much or as little as you can!
